item.description: Foundations Identity & Practice Tatlong problema ng Pinoy creators https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFm6EId2Tyc Our work is undervalued All we do is make things pretty or “aesthetic” Sometimes, it’s hard to feel your Filipino-ness in your work We usually use foreign styles, elements, and languages We measure our excellence in terms of being “world class”, or the ability to gain recognition abroad What happens to our self-worth?
